name: Accordion Solitaire
description:
Accordion Solitaire is a fun and challenging card game unlike other solitaire games you may have played before. Find matches to compress the ever-growing accordion of cards to as few stacks as possible. Can you get to one stack?


Features:
* Worldwide Scoreboard
* "Full Deck" game mode - deal the complete deck all at once, for more strategic play
* Hint button
* Undo button to take back last move
* Choice of table backgrounds
* Optimized for tablets
